Articles.Content:
I'm planning on buying a new PC soon, with that I will finally be able to use my joystick (my laptop have some sort of incompatibility). Saitek software allways gave me headaches and I've heard that this is more true with Windows 10. IIRC Scott Manley commented something about this in one of his videos.

Anyway, anyone here uses this joystick or any other from Saitek on Windows 10? How does it work? What did you do to get it working? Any side effects?

Thanks!
